verses.verse: It pleased <S%H8232><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%> to set <S%H6966><s%> over <S%H5922><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> an hundred <S%H3969><s%> and twenty <S%H6243><s%> princes, <S%H324><s%> which should be over the whole <S%H3606><s%> kingdom; <S%H4437><s%>

And over <S%H5924><s%> these <S%H4481><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> presidents; <S%H5632><s%> of whom <S%H1768><s%> <S%H2006><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> was first: <S%H2298><s%> that the princes <S%H324><s%> might give <S%H3052><s%> accounts <S%H2941><s%> to them, and the king <S%H4430><s%> should have <S%H1934><s%> no <S%H3809><s%> damage. <S%H5142><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> was preferred <S%H5330><s%> above <S%H5922><s%> the presidents <S%H5632><s%> and princes, <S%H324><s%> because <S%H3606><s%> an excellent <S%H3493><s%> spirit <S%H7308><s%> was in him; and the king <S%H4430><s%> thought <S%H6246><s%> to set <S%H6966><s%> him over <S%H5922><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> realm. <S%H4437><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> the presidents <S%H5632><s%> and princes <S%H324><s%> sought <S%H1158><s%> to find <S%H7912><s%> occasion <S%H5931><s%> against Daniel <S%H1841><s%> concerning <S%H6655><s%> the kingdom; <S%H4437><s%> but they could <S%H3202><s%> find <S%H7912><s%> none <S%H3809><s%> occasion <S%H5931><s%> nor <S%H3809><s%> fault; <S%H7844><s%> for as much <S%H3606><s%> as he was faithful, <S%H540><s%> neither <S%H3809><s%> was there any <S%H3606><s%> error <S%H7960><s%> or fault <S%H7844><s%> found <S%H7912><s%> in him.

Then <S%H116><s%> said <S%H560><s%> these <S%H479><s%> men, <S%H1400><s%> We shall not find <S%H7912><s%> any <S%H3606><s%> occasion <S%H5931><s%> against <S%H5922><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> except <S%H3861><s%> we find <S%H7912><s%> it against him concerning the law <S%H1882><s%> of his God. <S%H426><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> these <S%H459><s%> presidents <S%H5632><s%> and princes <S%H324><s%> assembled <S%H7284><s%> together to the king, <S%H4430><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> to him, King <S%H4430><s%> Darius, <S%H1868><s%> live <S%H2418><s%> for ever. <S%H5957><s%>

All <S%H3606><s%> the presidents <S%H5632><s%> of the kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> the governors, <S%H5461><s%> and the princes, <S%H324><s%> the counsellors, <S%H1907><s%> and the captains, <S%H6347><s%> have consulted <S%H3272><s%> together to establish <S%H6966><s%> a royal <S%H4430><s%> statute, <S%H7010><s%> and to make a firm <S%H8631><s%> decree, <S%H633><s%> that whoever <S%H3605><s%> shall ask <S%H1156><s%> a petition <S%H1159><s%> of any <S%H3606><s%> God <S%H426><s%> or man <S%H606><s%> for thirty <S%H8533><s%> days, <S%H3118><s%> save <S%H3861><s%> of you, O king, <S%H4430><s%> he shall be cast <S%H7412><s%> into the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions. <S%H744><s%>

Now, <S%H3705><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> establish <S%H6966><s%> the decree, <S%H633><s%> and sign <S%H7560><s%> the writing, <S%H3792><s%> that it be not changed, <S%H8133><s%> according to the law <S%H1882><s%> of the Medes <S%H4076><s%> and Persians, <S%H6540><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> alters <S%H5709><s%> not.
Why <S%H3605><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%> signed <S%H7560><s%> the writing <S%H3792><s%> and the decree. <S%H633><s%>

Now <S%H1768><s%> when <S%H1768><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> knew <S%H3046><s%> that the writing <S%H3792><s%> was signed, <S%H7560><s%> he went <S%H5954><s%> into his house; <S%H1005><s%> and his windows <S%H3551><s%> being open <S%H6606><s%> in his chamber <S%H5952><s%> toward <S%H5049><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3390><s%> he kneeled <S%H1289><s%> on his knees <S%H1291><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> times <S%H2166><s%> a day, <S%H3118><s%> and prayed, <S%H6739><s%> and gave thanks <S%H3029><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> his God, <S%H426><s%> as he did <S%H5648><s%> aforetime. <S%H4481><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> these <S%H479><s%> men <S%H1400><s%> assembled, <S%H7284><s%> and found <S%H7912><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> praying <S%H1156><s%> and making supplication <S%H2604><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> his God. <S%H426><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> they came <S%H7127><s%> near, <S%H7127><s%> and spoke <S%H560><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> the king's <S%H4430><s%> decree; <S%H633><s%> Have you not signed <S%H7560><s%> a decree, <S%H633><s%> that every <S%H3606><s%> man <S%H606><s%> that shall ask <S%H1156><s%> a petition of any <S%H3606><s%> God <S%H426><s%> or man <S%H606><s%> within <S%H5705><s%> thirty <S%H8533><s%> days, <S%H3118><s%> save <S%H3861><s%> of you, O king, <S%H4430><s%> shall be cast <S%H7412><s%> into the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions? <S%H744><s%> The king <S%H4430><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> The thing <S%H4406><s%> is true, <S%H3330><s%> according to the law <S%H1882><s%> of the Medes <S%H4076><s%> and Persians, <S%H6540><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> alters <S%H5709><s%> not.

Then <S%H116><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> they and said <S%H560><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> That Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> is of the children <S%H1123><s%> of the captivity <S%H1547><s%> of Judah, <S%H3061><s%> regards <S%H7761><s%> <S%H2942><s%> not you, O king, <S%H4430><s%> nor the decree <S%H633><s%> that you have signed, <S%H7560><s%> but makes his petition <S%H1159><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> times <S%H2166><s%> a day. <S%H3118><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> when <S%H1768><s%> he heard <S%H8086><s%> these words, <S%H4406><s%> was sore <S%H7690><s%> displeased <S%H888><s%> with himself, and set <S%H7761><s%> his heart <S%H1079><s%> on <S%H5922><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> to deliver <S%H7804><s%> him: and he labored <S%H7712><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> the going <S%H4606><s%> down <S%H4606><s%> of the sun <S%H8122><s%> to deliver <S%H5338><s%> him.

Then <S%H116><s%> these <S%H479><s%> men <S%H1400><s%> assembled <S%H7284><s%> to the king, <S%H4430><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> to the king, <S%H4430><s%> Know, <S%H3046><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> that the law <S%H1882><s%> of the Medes <S%H4076><s%> and Persians <S%H6540><s%> is, That no <S%H3606><s%> <S%H3809><s%> decree <S%H633><s%> nor statute <S%H7010><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> establishes <S%H6966><s%> may be changed. <S%H8133><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> commanded, <S%H560><s%> and they brought <S%H858><s%> Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> and cast <S%H7412><s%> him into the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions. <S%H744><s%> Now <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> to Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> Your God <S%H426><s%> whom <S%H1768><s%> you serve <S%H6399><s%> continually, <S%H8411><s%> he will deliver <S%H7804><s%> you.

And a stone <S%H69><s%> was brought, <S%H858><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> on the mouth <S%H6433><s%> of the den; <S%H1358><s%> and the king <S%H4430><s%> sealed <S%H2857><s%> it with his own signet, <S%H5824><s%> and with the signet <S%H5824><s%> of his lords; <S%H7261><s%> that the purpose <S%H6640><s%> might not be changed <S%H8133><s%> concerning Daniel. <S%H1841><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> went <S%H236><s%> to his palace, <S%H1965><s%> and passed the night <S%H956><s%> fasting: <S%H2908><s%> neither <S%H3809><s%> were instruments <S%H1761><s%> of music brought <S%H5954><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him: and his sleep <S%H8139><s%> went <S%H5075><s%> from him.

Then <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> arose <S%H6966><s%> very early <S%H8238><s%> in the morning, <S%H5053><s%> and went <S%H236><s%> in haste <S%H927><s%> to the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions. <S%H744><s%>

And when he came <S%H7127><s%> to the den, <S%H1358><s%> he cried <S%H2200><s%> with a lamentable <S%H6088><s%> voice <S%H7032><s%> to Daniel: <S%H1841><s%> and the king <S%H4430><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> to Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> O Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> servant <S%H5649><s%> of the living <S%H2417><s%> God, <S%H426><s%> is your God, <S%H426><s%> whom <S%H1768><s%> you serve <S%H6399><s%> continually, <S%H8411><s%> able <S%H3202><s%> to deliver <S%H7804><s%> you from the lions? <S%H744><s%>
Then <S%H116><s%> said <S%H4449><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> to the king, <S%H4430><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> live <S%H2418><s%> for ever. <S%H5957><s%>

My God <S%H426><s%> has sent <S%H7972><s%> his angel, <S%H4398><s%> and has shut <S%H5463><s%> the lions' <S%H744><s%> mouths, <S%H6433><s%> that they have not hurt <S%H2255><s%> me: for as much <S%H3606><s%> as before <S%H6925><s%> him innocence <S%H2136><s%> was found <S%H7912><s%> in me; and also <S%H638><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> you, O king, <S%H4430><s%> have I done <S%H5648><s%> no <S%H3809><s%> hurt. <S%H2248><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> was the king <S%H4430><s%> exceedingly <S%H7689><s%> glad <S%H2868><s%> for him, and commanded <S%H560><s%> that they should take <S%H5267><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> up out of the den. <S%H1358><s%> So Daniel <S%H1841><s%> was taken <S%H5267><s%> up out of the den, <S%H1358><s%> and no <S%H3606><s%> <S%H3809><s%> manner of hurt <S%H2257><s%> was found <S%H7912><s%> on him, because <S%H1768><s%> he believed <S%H540><s%> in his God. <S%H426><s%>

And the king <S%H4430><s%> commanded, <S%H560><s%> and they brought <S%H858><s%> those <S%H479><s%> men <S%H1400><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> had accused <S%H399><s%> <S%H7170><s%> Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> and they cast <S%H7412><s%> them into the den <S%H1358><s%> of lions, <S%H744><s%> them, their children, <S%H1123><s%> and their wives; <S%H5389><s%> and the lions <S%H744><s%> had the mastery <S%H7981><s%> of them, and broke <S%H1855><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> their bones <S%H1635><s%> in pieces or ever <S%H3809><s%> they came <S%H4291><s%> at the bottom <S%H773><s%> of the den. <S%H1358><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%> wrote <S%H3790><s%> to all <S%H3606><s%> people, <S%H5972><s%> nations, <S%H524><s%> and languages, <S%H3961><s%> that dwell <S%H1753><s%> in all <S%H3606><s%> the earth; <S%H772><s%> Peace <S%H8001><s%> be multiplied <S%H7680><s%> to you.

I make <S%H7761><s%> a decree, <S%H2942><s%> That in every <S%H3606><s%> dominion <S%H7985><s%> of my kingdom <S%H4437><s%> men tremble <S%H2112><s%> and fear <S%H1763><s%> before <S%H4481><s%> <S%H6925><s%> the God <S%H426><s%> of Daniel: <S%H1841><s%> for he is the living <S%H2417><s%> God, <S%H426><s%> and steadfast <S%H7011><s%> for ever, <S%H5957><s%> and his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> that which <S%H1768><s%> shall not be destroyed, <S%H2255><s%> and his dominion <S%H7985><s%> shall be even to the end. <S%H5491><s%>

He delivers <S%H7804><s%> and rescues, <S%H5338><s%> and he works <S%H5648><s%> signs <S%H852><s%> and wonders <S%H8540><s%> in heaven <S%H8065><s%> and in earth, <S%H772><s%> who <S%H1768><s%> has delivered <S%H7804><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> from the power <S%H3028><s%> of the lions. <S%H744><s%>
So this <S%H1836><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> prospered <S%H6744><s%> in the reign <S%H4437><s%> of Darius, <S%H1868><s%> and in the reign <S%H4437><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> the Persian. <S%H6542><s%>
